com.hp.autonomy.hod.client.api.textindex.query.fields

Interface RetrieveIndexFieldsService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RetrieveIndexFieldsServiceImpl

    public interface RetrieveIndexFieldsService
    Service representing the RetrieveIndexFields API

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RetrieveIndexFieldsResponse retrieveIndexFields(ResourceIdentifier index, RetrieveIndexFieldsRequestBuilder params)
      Retrieve from HP Haven OnDemand a list of the fields that have been indexed into a given text index using a token proxy provided by a TokenProxyService
      RetrieveIndexFieldsResponse retrieveIndexFields(TokenProxy tokenProxy, ResourceIdentifier index, RetrieveIndexFieldsRequestBuilder params)
      Retrieve from HP Haven OnDemand a list of the fields that have been indexed into a given text index using the given token proxy

    • Method Detail

      • retrieveIndexFields

        RetrieveIndexFieldsResponse retrieveIndexFields(ResourceIdentifier index,
                                              RetrieveIndexFieldsRequestBuilder params)
                                                throws HodErrorException
        Retrieve from HP Haven OnDemand a list of the fields that have been indexed into a given text index using a token proxy provided by a TokenProxyService
        Parameters:
        index - The index to retrieve fields from
        params - Parameters to be sent as part of the request
        Returns:
        A list of fields and their types
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If a TokenProxyService has not been defined
        HodAuthenticationFailedException - If the token associated with the token proxy has expired
        HodErrorException

      • retrieveIndexFields

        RetrieveIndexFieldsResponse retrieveIndexFields(TokenProxy tokenProxy,
                                              ResourceIdentifier index,
                                              RetrieveIndexFieldsRequestBuilder params)
                                                throws HodErrorException
        Retrieve from HP Haven OnDemand a list of the fields that have been indexed into a given text index using the given token proxy
        Parameters:
        tokenProxy - The token proxy to use
        index - The index to retrieve fields from
        params - Parameters to be sent as part of the request
        Returns:
        A list of fields and their types
        Throws:
        HodAuthenticationFailedException - If the token associated with the token proxy has expired
        HodErrorException
